name: Navbar
description: Navigation bar component for the landing page
example: <Navbar logo='/logo.svg' menuItems={['Home', 'Services', 'About', 'Contact']} actionButton={{ text: 'Get Started', url: '/signup' }} />

tailwind.container: flex items-center justify-between w-full py-4 px-6 bg-white shadow-sm
tailwind.actionButton: bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors

name: HeroSection
description: Main hero section with headline, subheading and call-to-action
example: <HeroSection title='Transform Your Business' subtitle='Innovative solutions for modern challenges' image='/hero-image.jpg' cta={{ text: 'Learn More', url: '/services' }} />

tailwind.wrapper: max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-16 md:py-24 lg:py-32
tailwind.title: text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl font-bold text-gray-900 tracking-tight
tailwind.subtitle: text-xl md:text-2xl text-gray-600 mt-4 max-w-3xl
tailwind.ctaButton: inline-flex items-center px-6 py-3 border border-transparent text-base font-medium rounded-md shadow-sm text-white bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500

name: Services
example: <Services title='Our Services' services={[{title: 'Web Development', description: 'Custom websites and applications', icon: 'web-icon'}, {title: 'Mobile Apps', description: 'iOS and Android development', icon: 'mobile-icon'}]} />

name: HowItWorks
example: <HowItWorks title='How It Works' steps={[{number: 1, title: 'Discovery', description: 'We learn about your needs'}, {number: 2, title: 'Strategy', description: 'We develop a plan'}]} />

name: SocialProof
example: <SocialProof title='Trusted By' testimonials={[{text: 'Amazing service!', author: 'John Doe', company: 'ABC Inc'}]} logos={['/client1.svg', '/client2.svg']} />

name: WhyChooseUs
example: <WhyChooseUs title='Why Choose Us' reasons={[{title: 'Experience', description: '10+ years in the industry'}, {title: 'Results', description: '500+ successful projects'}]} />

name: TeamSection
example: <TeamSection title='Our Team' subtitle='Meet the experts behind our success' members={[{name: 'Jane Smith', role: 'CEO', image: '/team/jane.jpg', bio: 'Experienced leader'}]} />

name: MapContact
example: <MapContact address='123 Business St, City, Country' phone='+1 234 567 8900' email='contact@example.com' mapUrl='https://maps.google.com/?q=123+Business+St' />

name: FAQ
description: Frequently asked questions with expandable answers
example: <FAQ title='Frequently Asked Questions' questions={[{question: 'What services do you offer?', answer: 'We provide web development, mobile apps, and consulting services.'}, {question: 'How much does it cost?', answer: 'Pricing depends on project scope.'}]} />

name: Footer
description: Page footer with links, social media, and copyright
example: <Footer logo='/logo.svg' links={[{text: 'Privacy', url: '/privacy'}, {text: 'Terms', url: '/terms'}]} social={[{platform: 'Twitter', url: 'https://twitter.com/example'}, {platform: 'LinkedIn', url: 'https://linkedin.com/company/example'}]} copyright='Â© 2023 Example Company. All rights reserved.' />
